text:
“Among the craziest provisions of the 1,800-page HEROES Act are a temporary elimination of the cap on state & local tax deductions on federal income taxes. This is a move that would mostly benefit wealthy taxpayers in blue states–people like Nancy Pelosi."
https://t.co/IXA09jwcvs
